name: I'm Sitting With My Phone
description:
Through the idea behind Alvin Lucier's I'm sitting in a room, this piece uses Instagram's stories interface to generate feedbacked glitched videos created continuously using only what the platform itself and its natural digital graphic reverb and degradation generates, showcasing what Hito Steyerl called "Poor Images".
